scope.title: Responsive props
scope.overview: AgDS provides first class support for mobile-first responsive styles.
scope.opener: The Agriculture Design System provides first class support for mobile-first responsive styles. Instead of manually writing CSS media queries throughout your codebase, our primitive components allow you to provide arrays and objects to generate responsive styles in your project.
